div.p: Report Cards will be available today at 5:00 pm via the Parent Portal
Please stay at home if you are sick or have any of these symptoms:
* Pre-K - 2nd grade packet and 3rd - 5th grade Chromebook pick-up time:
6th - 12th grade Chromebook pick up time: April 1, 2020 from 10 am - 2pm
WEMS parents may pick up chrome books at the rear of the school near the baseball field where you picked up the first packets.
**A parent or guardian will need to sign for the Chromebook

** If your 3rd - 12th grade Scholar will need an alternative paper packet or if you wish not to get a Chromebook, Pre-K - 12th grade packets will be linked at: www.williston.k12.sc.us by midnight Monday, April 13, 2020

span.em: Williston School District 29 will collaborate with the community to provide a safe, equitable, and rigorous learning environment.
The vision of Williston School District 29 is to make every Scholar college and career ready, a productive citizen, and globally competitive.

Williston School District 29 is an equal opportunity employer. The District make employment decisions on the basis of individual merit and without discrimination due to race, religion, color, disability, sex, age, alienage, or national origin in accordance with State and Federal laws.
Kathy Griffin, Director of Special Services, 803-266-8012

br.em: or Dr. LaToya Thomas-Dixon, Director of Human Resources, 803-266-8011 for assistance.
